channel.title: CNN 10 (video)

channel.itunes:author: CNN
channel.itunes:summary: CNN 10 is a 10-minute digital news show that serves a growing audience interested in compact on-demand news broadcasts ideal for explanation seekers on the go or in the classroom.
channel.description: CNN 10 is a 10-minute digital news show that serves a growing audience interested in compact on-demand news broadcasts ideal for explanation seekers on the go or in the classroom.

item.title: CNN10 - 12/14/18
item.description: Our last show of the season covers a ceasefire in Yemen and the recognition of the CNN Hero of the Year. We look forward to seeing you again on January 3, 2019!
item.dc:creator: CNN
item.itunes:author: CNN
item.itunes:summary: Our last show of the season covers a ceasefire in Yemen and the recognition of the CNN Hero of the Year. We look forward to seeing you again on January 3, 2019!

item.title: CNN10 - 12/13/18
item.description: A former lawyer for the U.S. president is sentenced to prison, Britain's leader wins a confidence vote, and we report on the deadliest drug in America.
item.dc:creator: CNN
item.itunes:author: CNN
item.itunes:summary: A former lawyer for the U.S. president is sentenced to prison, Britain's leader wins a confidence vote, and we report on the deadliest drug in America.

item.title: CNN10 - 12/12/18
item.description: A Google executive testifies on Capitol Hill, a CNN Young Wonder helps the less fortunate celebrate birthdays, and a cake draws thousands to a Hungarian cafe.
item.dc:creator: CNN
item.itunes:author: CNN
item.itunes:summary: A Google executive testifies on Capitol Hill, a CNN Young Wonder helps the less fortunate celebrate birthdays, and a cake draws thousands to a Hungarian cafe.

item.title: CNN10 - 12/11/18
item.description: A Brexit vote is delayed in Britain, parts of the U.S. Southeast are snowed in, and landmine removal renews access to Christian holy sites in the Middle East.
item.dc:creator: CNN
item.itunes:author: CNN
item.itunes:summary: A Brexit vote is delayed in Britain, parts of the U.S. Southeast are snowed in, and landmine removal renews access to Christian holy sites in the Middle East.

item.title: CNN10 - 12/10/18
item.description: France's leader plans to address his nation amid continued unrest, SpaceX marks a success and a failure, and a Young Wonder helps children in Africa play ball.
item.dc:creator: CNN
item.itunes:author: CNN
item.itunes:summary: France's leader plans to address his nation amid continued unrest, SpaceX marks a success and a failure, and a Young Wonder helps children in Africa play ball.

item.title: CNN10 - 12/07/18
item.description: Today's topics include National Pearl Harbor Remembrance Day in the U.S., tensions surrounding the Black Sea, and the pros and cons of "smart kitchens."
item.dc:creator: CNN
item.itunes:author: CNN
item.itunes:summary: Today's topics include National Pearl Harbor Remembrance Day in the U.S., tensions surrounding the Black Sea, and the pros and cons of "smart kitchens."
